repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p:
A composite manuscript containing:
The Civāñāṉapōtam (Indien 26a, f1-f10 = Indien 26a, U1).
The Vayirākatīpam (Indien 26a, f11-f24 = Indien 26a, U2).
The Pacupatipācaviḷakkam (Indien 26b and Indien 26c). Indien 26b is incomplete and Indien 26c provide the missing stanzas (repeating some stanzas already found in Indien 26b).

The manuscript was in disorder at the time of first examination (February 2021) and has been reordered at the time of second examination (March 2022). The two folios that make Indien 26c were mixed up at the end of Indien 26b. The digital images on Didomena show the manuscript before and after reordering.
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (February 2021 and March 2022).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

support.p: Single-holed leaves for U1, U2, 26a; two-holed leaves for 26b, 26c.

collation.desc: 1 folio = Title Page (additional). No foliation. Double folio. Verso blank. 340 x 30 mm.
1 folio = guard leaf (additional). No foliation. Recto blank. Verso more dark = original outside page. 340 x 30 mm.

supportDesc.condition: Relatively good state of preservation, except Indien 26b and Indien 26c.

BnF donation sticker DON N° (back cover, verso).

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF. 345 x 35 mm.

origin.origDate: Indien 26a internally dated to the year kara of the Jovian cycle, that is, CE 1831-1832, 1771-1772, 1711-1712, etc. See colophon (U1a, f10v4). Indien 26a and 26b respectively dated to circa 1830 and circa 1775 by Vinson (1868) and to 1830 and 1775 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequeathed in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177). Ariel manuscript not acknowledged by Cabaton (1912).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. — See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
